author: Stereogum
title: Chance The Rapper, Sturgill Simpson Will Perform At Grammys
text: There is always a good chance the Grammys will turn into the same maddening slog that they always are, but this year's Grammys telecast is shaping up nicely. Earlier this week, the show added a couple of intriguing performer combinations , with the Weeknd to perform with Daft Punk and a Tribe Called Quest to … More »
